items.sentence: I like how you avoided answering Tom\'s question.
Tom noticed a police car in the rear-view mirror.
We need to try to get everybody inside the house.
When did you notice that your wallet was missing?
Who do you think wrote that graffiti on the wall?
You\'re visiting a factory tomorrow, aren\'t you?
They charged me thirty dollars to fix my bicycle.
They wanted to make sure I was going to be there.
I\'ve known Tom since we went to school together.
If Tom finds out I told you this, he\'ll kill me.
